Instrument.name: The Cometary Secondary Ion Mass Analyzer (COSIMA) for the Rosetta Orbiter
Instrument.description: The COSIMA spectrometer was a time-of-flight secondary ion mass spectrometer consisting of four elements: a dust collector and target manipulator; the COSISCOPE, a microscope to inspects the target; a primary ion source; and a mass spectrometer. The ion extraction optics and ion detector were included in the mass spectrometer.
